local_intent: Redetect and align to the T block, set yaw to 45°, perform a single diagonal push, then verify visibility.
assumptions: Block remains reachable and on planar surface
Visual tracking remains available for verification
45° yaw is appropriate for diagonal push direction
coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer-phase micro-goal: align to the block, set yaw to 45°, execute one push toward the goal, and verify visibility, matching the GLOBAL_BT push step and the description.
